attributes.action: Make new drivers ride and pass a motorcycle test before being allowed behind the wheel of a car
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This would make drivers more aware of motorcycles,so in the long run help prevent accidents,and death on our roads

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps several in existence already -
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/DriversCBT/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
